Dialogs.Text: Thomas B: In the message they told me the server was abandoned. So i expected that it would be just me and, probably, them.
Thomas B: But after some exploring, i found two users online. And from what they told me, there is more people active here.
Thomas B: Weird it wasn't clarified in the message, specially since this user appearently wants to be discreet about this.
Thomas B: This caught me completely unaware, i could've confused any of this users for my contact if i wasn't careful enough.
Thomas B: Still, mistakes happen, but there are still thing to go on about before pondering over just this.
